fields.description:
Currently blob images are always saved as JPEG. The request is to allow changing blob's mime type to save in different formats.
Parity with Android should be checked.
fields.summary: iOS: Make TiBlob mimeType property changeable and save image blobs in a format (png/jpeg) according to set mime type
